long_description: The prAna Flex shorts are perfect for just about any kind of activity, whether you use them during tough, teeth-gnashing climbs or during an easy jog around the neighborhood. 2-way stretch recycled polyester/spandex blend fabric makes them extremely comfortable and durable. Elastic waistband is soft on the inside, and a CoolMax(R) liner enhances moisture-wicking comfort. prAna Flex shorts feature a side stash pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The prAna Flex shorts are perfect for just about any kind of activity, whether you use them during tough, teeth-gnashing climbs or during an easy jog around the neighborhood.
